revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Paniola Ranch |image = [[File:Paniola Ranch.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Paniola Ranch. |tokens = 855,000 |location = West of Paniola Town }}
<!--T:2--> '''Paniola Ranch''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 12,111,328 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Mareep.png|40px]] Mareep || [[File:Madame.png|40px]] Madame Elizabeth || [[File:Carbink.png|40px]] Carbink |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Lillipup.png|40px]] Lillipup || [[File:Pokémon Breeder (male).png|40px]] Pokémon Breeder Glenn || [[File:Mudbray.png|40px]] Mudbray |- | [[File:Pokémon Breeder (male).png|40px]] Pokémon Breeder Wesley || [[File:Tauros.png|40px]] Tauros |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Mudbray.png|40px]] Mudbray || [[File:Gentleman.png|40px]] Gentleman Gerald || [[File:Sableye.png|40px]]Sableye |- | [[File:Rising Star (male).png|40px]] Rising Star Micah || [[File:Lillipup.png|40px]] Lillipup, [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite |}
